caseTitle: Supreme Court Bar Association, through its Vice-President, Islamabad and others v. Pakistan Bar Council, through its Secretary, Islamabad and another
tagline: (1) According to the petitioners, the show cause notices and de-seating orders were issued without due process and in violation of Rule 118 and 125 of the Pakistan Legal Practitioners & Bar Council Rules, 1976.  (2) The terms and conditions of settlement of all disputes agreed by the representatives of PBC and SCBA in the Court.
